elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Help Timo and think about which influences from the individual environmental spheres could be important for the general store.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Social environmental sphere
elements.correctAnswer: Social and legal changes. Examples: Changes in purchasing behavior, desire for regional, environmentally friendly products, new eating habits, store opening hours, hygiene regulations, legislation on alcohol sales.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Ecological environmental sphere
elements.correctAnswer: Nature offers the company resources, but is also burdened by the company. Examples: Purchasing from regional producers, short transportation routes, waste disposal (recycling), energy-saving appliances.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Technological environmental sphere
elements.correctAnswer: Technological developments. Examples: new checkout system, possibilities of the Internet, new energy-efficient devices, product developments.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Economic environmental sphere
elements.correctAnswer: Concerns the general economic conditions. Examples: current economic situation, competitive situation, price trends, economic policy measures.
